New Records: Rohit Sharma became the first player to five T20I centuries
Key Match Events: Match tied in the first Super Over, necessitating a second
Rohit Sharma hit two sixes in the first Super Over and one in the second
Afghanistan's highest score while chasing in a T20I against India
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed relief at his batting performance
India's spin bowlers performed well in the Super Overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a high-scoring encounter with 212 runs in the last two overs
Afghanistan's batting performance was impressive but not enough
